alert.note: Alert for Blair; Centre; Huntingdon (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 3:47PM EDT until September 09 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Blair County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Huntingdon County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 347 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bald Eagle, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bald Eagle around 350 PM EDT. Warriors Mark around 400 PM EDT. Port Matilda and Stormstown around 430 PM EDT. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 48 to 65. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
